   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Temperature and CO2 plotter's documentation!
=======================================================

This is a python module for interactive plotting of CO2 and temperature data on a web server.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

How to run
==========

Start the server with

.. code-block:: bash
    
    python3 server.py

And open the generated link in a web browser.
